ygData.subject: Wow!
ygData.msgSnippet: So last night, my druid friend and I re-enter Mistmoore and find a group with a couple of friends.  They are a bit higher level but its working ok. Then
ygData.messageBody:
So last night, my druid friend and I re-enter Mistmoore and find a group
with a couple of friends. They are a bit higher level but its working ok.
Then Macgrough asks if he can join and oh wow, what a great couple of hours!
The experience flew! Macgrough played just instruments, I fought, we also
had a warrior, wizzie and 2 druids. We had non-stop fighting and great fun!
All I have to say is playing with another bard is awesome - and I even
leveled! (Not to mention it was great to meet Mac after talking to him
here). And he gave me good bard lessons and wow! He even put up with me
and my online sweetie being schmoopy! Ok, well obviously I had a good time,
just wanted to say wow! and thanks to Mac!

Tani, 22nd (woo hoo!) Bard
Halana, 50th Shammie
Solusek Ro

Wendy Lynn Cranfill
Maxtor Corporation


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
